bib.title: Measurement of the Bi-209(n,gamma)Bi-210g cross section and updated s-process analysis of the Pb/Bi region

free_txt: SD: Corrections in all Subents. Subent 008
No data shown, subentry 23051.008 should be deleted.
Li-6 glass detector at 90 cm distance from
lithium target - to monitor the neutron flux in
Li-7(p,n)Be-7 reaction at kT=25 keV.Protons of
1912 keV. Collimated neutron beam in forward cone with
opening angle of a20 deg. Water cooled Li target.
Quasi-Maxwellian neutron spectrum of kT=25 +- 0.5 keV.
Two very thin Bi metal samples were prepared by
evaporation to count alpha-decay; purity better 99.99%.
Two more massive powder samples were pressed for AMS
Each was sandwiched between thin gold foils of the same
(-a and -b - for different periods of counting)
For the decay of Po-210 during the irradiation and for
fluctuations in neutron yield - factor Fb.
in vacuum (2.E3 Pa) chamber several cm in front of

Uncertainty of Fb turned out to be negligible.
